name: Treasure Dungeon (PlaidFlannel)
description:
This is a simple RPG where you make your way through a dungeon fighting enemies and obtaining keys to open doors and treasure chests. The more gold you can find the better. You will also level up and become quite powerful before the end...

Controls:

  • WASD for movement, or use the onscreen clickable buttons
  • Click the Attack button when standing beside an enemy.

Game audio is from https://kenney.nl . I used a few clips from the RPG Audio and Impact Sounds packs.
